{"id":1075471931,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1697339000,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1075471931/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Shortest and Lexicographically Smallest Beautiful String","memory":"7.7 MB","code":"\n\nclass Solution {\n\npublic:\n\n    string shortestBeautifulSubstring(string s, int k) {\n\n        list<int>ls;\n\n        int i = 0;\n\n        priority_queue<pair<int,string>,vector<pair<int,string>>,greater<pair<int,string>>\n\n            >pq;\n\n        while(i<s.size()){\n\n            if(ls.size()<k and s[i]=='1')ls.push_back(i);\n\n            if(ls.size()==k){\n\n                cout<<s.substr(ls.front(),(ls.back()-ls.front()+1))<<\" \"<<ls.back() - ls.front()<<endl;\n\n                pq.push({ls.back() - ls.front(),s.substr(ls.front(),(ls.back()-ls.front()+1))});\n\n                ls.pop_front();\n\n            }\n\n            i++;\n\n        }\n\n        if(pq.empty())return \"\";\n\n        string ans = pq.top().second;\n\n        int x = pq.top().first;\n\n        pq.pop();\n\n        while(!pq.empty()){\n\n            if(pq.top().first==x)ans = min(ans,pq.top().second);\n\n            pq.pop();\n\n        }\n\n        return ans;\n\n    }\n\n};\n        \n    \n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"shortest-and-lexicographically-smallest-beautiful-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
